unpack.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to take everything out of a box, bag, suitcase etc
unpack.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I havenâ€™t had a chance to unpack yet.

unpack.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make an idea or problem easier to understand by considering all the parts of it separately
unpack.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Some of the issues surrounding mental illness have been unpacked in Chapter 3.
